variables.hero_title: The perfect online store for your business is already prepared
variables.hero_text: Ready-made website themes that will turn into your store in a few steps. Upgrade your business with Wawify.
variables.products_text: Choose a template that will give your store a clean and modern look, allowing your products to appear more appealing and capture customers attention.
variables.cta_text: Try on a website template that you like for your store
